comments.body: It looks like this interface is exposed to the user, so it would be worth having some tests the exercise this (have a class that implements this interface or a function that takes this as an argument). If it's not meant to be consumed directly and only through the Context, then the interface should not be exported.

Thank you for the review, I hide interface from export. Technically use this module directly possibly but you need to require this class by path.

3f8add4
